definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Do cattle and horses, when you become old, or has been abandoned patriarchal grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 做牛做馬，人老珠黃時，還是被重男輕女的姥爺拋棄。

sentences.english: Men grow old, pearls grow yellow, there is no cure for it.
sentences.chinese: 人老珠黃，沒有什麼可以醫治的。

sentences.english: Wait until you old, who will be by your side.
sentences.chinese: 等到你人老珠黃時，誰還會在你身邊。

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
a shattered mirror put back together (idiom)/(of marriage) to pick up the pieces and start anew/for a separated couple to reconcile and reunite
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]
